title: Authentication Issue
description: Users are experiencing issues while logging in. After entering their credentials, the system does not authenticate them properly and redirects them to the login page again.

title: Performance Degradation
description: The application response time has significantly increased over the past week. Users are reporting slow loading times for various pages and actions.

title: Database Connection Error
description: The application is unable to establish a connection with the database. As a result, users are unable to retrieve or submit data.

title: UI Rendering Issue
description: Certain elements of the user interface are not rendering properly. This includes misaligned buttons, overlapping text, and missing images.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: Users have requested the addition of a dark mode feature to the application. This would improve visibility and reduce eye strain during prolonged usage, especially in low-light environments.
